entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 11:18 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
